name: Aliens
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Babylon
startIntroPart1: I am Hammurabi, king of Babylon, the lawgiver who seeks justice and prosperity for my people.
startIntroPart2: Together, we shall build a civilization renowned for its wisdom and achievements.
declaringWar: You have defied the laws of righteousness; prepare to face the might of Babylon!
attacked: An unwise move; Babylon shall stand firm against all aggressors.
defeated: Though Babylon falls today, our legacy of law and culture shall endure.
introduction: Welcome, traveler. May our exchanges be guided by mutual respect and wisdom.
neutralHello: Greetings. How may we assist each other today?
tradeRequest: Let us engage in trade that benefits both our peoples.
uniques: May buy [Science] buildings with [Gold] [in all cities]
afterPeace: Peace is restored; may it usher in a new era of prosperity.

name: China
startIntroPart1: Greetings, mighty Emperor Qin Shi Huang, unifier of China and builder of wonders.
startIntroPart2: Your legacy of strength and unity has laid the foundation for a great civilization.
declaringWar: Prepare for battle! The unyielding might of China shall prevail.
attacked: You dare challenge the First Emperor? Retribution will be swift.
defeated: Even the greatest of emperors must face destiny. My empire shall endure.
introduction: I am Qin Shi Huang, the First Emperor of China. State your intentions.
hateHello: State your business, if you must.
hateYes: You leave me no choice but to agree.
afterPeace: Peace is restored. Let us rebuild and strengthen our empire.
tradeRequest: China proposes a trade that will benefit both our nations.
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [Wonders] wonders [in all cities]
